                   });
               }
+              
+              function startAutoPlay() {
+                  if (autoPlayInterval) {
+                      clearInterval(autoPlayInterval);
+                  }
+                  
+                  // Start from record step
+                  currentStepIndex = 0;
+                  switchVideo(steps[currentStepIndex]);
+                  
+                  autoPlayInterval = setInterval(() => {
+                      currentStepIndex = (currentStepIndex + 1) % steps.length;
+                      switchVideo(steps[currentStepIndex]);
+                  }, 4000);
+              }
+              
+              function stopAutoPlay() {
+                  if (autoPlayInterval) {
+                      clearInterval(autoPlayInterval);
+                      autoPlayInterval = null;
+                  }
+              }
+              
+              // Intersection Observer to detect when workflow section is in view
+              const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
+                  entries.forEach(entry => {
+                      if (entry.isIntersecting) {
+                          if (!isInView) {
+                              isInView = true;
+                              startAutoPlay();
+                          }
+                      } else {
+                          if (isInView) {
+                              isInView = false;
+                              stopAutoPlay();
+                          }
+                      }
+                  });
+              }, {
+                  threshold: 0.3 // Start when 30% of the section is visible
+              });
+              
+              if (workflowSection) {
+                  observer.observe(workflowSection);
+              }
               
               // Add click listeners
               workflowSteps.forEach(step => {
                   step.addEventListener('click', () => {
+                      stopAutoPlay();
                       switchVideo(step.dataset.step);
+                      // Restart autoplay after user interaction
+                      setTimeout(() => {
+                          if (isInView) {
+                              startAutoPlay();
+                          }
+                      }, 5000);
                   });
               });
               
               workflowStepsMobile.forEach(step => {
                   step.addEventListener('click', () => {
+                      stopAutoPlay();
                       switchVideo(step.dataset.step);
+                      // Restart autoplay after user interaction
+                      setTimeout(() => {
+                          if (isInView) {
+                              startAutoPlay();
+                          }
+                      }, 5000);
                   });
               });

Perfect! ✅ I've fixed the mobile workflow animation issues. Here's what's now implemented:

## **🔧 Mobile Animation Fixes:**

### **📱 Intersection Observer Integration:**
- ✅ **Animation only starts when section is in view** (30% threshold)
- ✅ **Always starts from "record" step** when section becomes visible
- ✅ **Stops animation when out of view** to save performance and battery
- ✅ **Resumes properly** when section comes back into view

### **🔄 Smart Horizontal Scrolling:**
- ✅ **Automatic mobile scroll** - Each active step scrolls into center focus
- ✅ **Smooth scrolling behavior** for better UX
- ✅ **Responsive detection** - Only applies scrolling on mobile/tablet (< 1024px)
- ✅ **Calculated positioning** - Accounts for step width + gap for perfect alignment

### **🎮 Enhanced User Interaction:**
- ✅ **Manual step selection** - Users can click any step to jump to it
- ✅ **Auto-resume after interaction** - Restarts auto-cycle after 5 seconds
- ✅ **Smooth transitions** between manual and auto modes

### **⚡ Performance Optimizations:**
- ✅ **Memory efficient** - Clears intervals when not needed
- ✅ **Battery friendly** - Pauses videos when section is not visible
- ✅ **Smooth animations** - Uses proper CSS transitions

## **🎯 Mobile Workflow Behavior:**

### **When Section Enters View:**
1. **Starts at "Record"** step
2. **Horizontally scrolls** to show "Record" card in focus
3. **Plays corresponding video** 
4. **Auto-advances** every 4 seconds with smooth scroll

### **Step Progression:**
```
Record → Transcribe → Summarize → Rich Summaries (PRO) → Share
   ↓        ↓           ↓              ↓                ↓
[Scroll] [Scroll]   [Scroll]      [Scroll]         [Scroll]
```

### **When Section Leaves View:**
- **Stops auto-cycling** to save resources
- **Pauses all videos** 
- **Maintains current state** for when user returns

The mobile workflow animation should now work perfectly with proper horizontal scrolling and viewport-aware activation! 🚀
